template.name: WSO2ESBCustomArtifactPlugin
template.description: This is a WSO2 ESB plugin project. This will give you a plugin project which when installed on eclipse will give you a new project creation option to create a custom artifact project for WSO2 ESB 4.9.0

template.name: WSO2CEPMultipleArtifactProjectPlugin
template.description: This is a WSO2 CEP plugin project. This will give you a plugin project which when installed on eclipse will give you a new project creation option to create a multiple artifact project, in which you can store multiple artifacts, It also includes a simple XML artifact to be saved in the multiple artifact project. You can add as many artifacts as you want to be saved in the multiple artifact project following the same pattern. And also you can even add new artifacts for the same multiple artifact project using different plugins
